mapper.insert: INSERT INTO smalldatatypes (data_type, data_type_english, big_data_type_id) VALUES (#{dataType}, #{dataTypeEnglish}, #{bigDataTypeId})
mapper.select: SELECT smalldatatypes.id as id, smalldatatypes.data_type as data_type, smalldatatypes.data_type_english as data_type_english, bigdatatypes.id as big_data_type_id FROM smalldatatypes, bigdatatypes WHERE smalldatatypes.big_data_type_id = bigdatatypes.id AND bigdatatypes.id = #{bigDataTypeId}

SELECT smalldatatypes.data_type as sDataType, smalldatatypes.data_type_english as sDataTypeEnglish, bigdatatypes.data_type as bDataType,bigdatatypes.data_type_english as bDataTypeEnglish FROM smalldatatypes, bigdatatypes WHERE smalldatatypes.big_data_type_id = bigdatatypes.id
